#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

const int N = 1e6 + 10;

int n;
int st[N];

void init_prime(int n)
{
for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++)
{
if (st[i])
continue;
for (int j = i * 2; j <= n; j += i)
{
if (!st[j])
st[j] = 1;
}
}
return;
}

int main(void)
{

{

{

}
return 0;
}

#include <stdio.h>
#define MAX_N 100
int prime[MAX_N + 5], priNum=0;
int p[MAX_N + 5] = {0};

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ç´ æ•°è¡¨
void init_prime() {
for (int i = 2; i <= MAX_N; i++) {
if(p[i] == 0)
prime[priNum++] = i;
for (int j = 0; j <= MAX_N; j++) {
if(i * prime[j] > MAX_N)
break;
p[i * prime[j]] = 1;
if(i % prime[j] == 0)
break;
}
}
return ;
}

int main() {
init_prime();
int sum = 0;
for (int i = 0; i <= priNum; i++) {
sum += prime[i]; // ç´ æ•°ç´¯åŠ 
}
printf("%d\n", sum);
return 0;
}
